facebook.title: Profiles in Oncology Social Media: Michael Fisch, MD, MPH, @... : Oncology Times
facebook.summary: A new issue (12/10) is now online, including the newest of our Profiles in Oncology Social Media: Michael Fisch, MD, PhD, of MD Anderson Cancer Center http://journals.lww.com/oncology-times/Fulltext/2012/12100/Profiles_in_Oncology_Social_Media__Michael_Fis

facebook.title: Profiles in Oncology Social Media: Michael Fisch, MD, MPH, @... : Oncology Times
facebook.summary: “There is almost no way to miss things if you're on Twitter and you have your Twitter feeds set up right,” he said. “Basically nothing important can get by you. You are like a hockey goalie for information, and there are very few pucks that get by.”
